EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_Containers and Pivotal Cloud Foundry_Q416.Confirmatio
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading the Containers and Pivotal Cloud Foundry white paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Containers and Pivotal Cloud Foundry white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you explore technology options for your digital transformation journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- Video: Help Developers Do What They Love <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdw_9dADM-4]]> - Blog: How Cloud Foundry Gives Developers A Reliable Container Runtime <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/how-cloud-foundry-gives-developers-a-reliable-container-runtime]]> - Video: Moments in Container History <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/infographic/moments-container-history-video]]> - Document: Using Docker in Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/1-8/adminguide/docker.html]]> - Blog: 5 Confessions Of A Platform Builder <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/case-studies/5-confessions-of-a-platform-builder]]> - White Paper: The Upside-Down Economics of Building Your Own Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-upside-down-economics-of-building-your-own-platform]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, donâ€™t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team For in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email-confirmation&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=asset-download-confirmation]]>, taking place December 4-7, 2017 in San Francisco.
